snippet: ALEXANDER--Marjorie, of Scarsdale, NY, on June 17th, 2016. Loving wife, mother, grandmother and great- grandmother. Predeceased by her husband, Norman E. Alexander. Survived by her children, Gail Binderman, Sharon Zoffness, Dr. Mark Alexander and Leslie Alexander. Grandmother to Deborah, Dan, Rachel, Courtney (Jeremy Gough), Benjamin (Mandy). Great-grandmother to Oliver, Leo and Hayden. Services will be private. 1/3
